document_data.caption: A map showing Selûne's Stairs on the east side of Spring Hill.
document_data.name: Selûne's Stairs
document_data.mainbody: '''Selûne's Stairs''' was a small waterfall or cascade located in the town of [[Immersea]] in [[Cormyr]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas|4300 Immersea}}
document_data.Geography: The cascade originated on the eastern side of [[Spring Hill]]. Its waters fed the [[Immer Stream]] which also flowed east before emptying into an arm of the [[Wyvernwater]].
